item.title: Angering some folksâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: It seems I've angered both the owner of Airbag blog and a number of commenter's to that blog. The article originating it/comment thread is here. (I'm the commenter "Brian" trying to explain what was going on and apologizing.) I've been told by one of the commenter's to "begone"...oh well my first official piece of the Internet I've been kicked out of. By the way I really do enjoy the Airbag blog, it's funny, fresh and filled with topics I enjoy. (And no I'm not being sarcastic, I do like it.)
